metadata.title: Alex Kuligowski – Professional Project Portfolio
metadata.description: Hello — welcome to my collection of software projects and ways to get in touch. Feel free to reach out if you'd like to connect or collaborate.

home.intro: I've been in tech for 10 years. Started in QA, moved into solutions engineering, now I build full-stack apps. I ask questions and communicate clearly.
home.workingOnIntro: Creating with software is a daily practice. A couple of recent projects:
home.kestrelDesc: A C++ and Swift system health monitor for macOS — embedded-style design with built-in fault injection.
home.theShelfDesc: An attention-management app for tracking progress and building healthy routines.
home.projectBridgeDesc: A local-first tool that analyzes your repos against job descriptions and recommends projects to close skill gaps.
home.forThoseHereDesc: A mobile app for end-of-life planning so loved ones don't have to guess on the days they deserve to grieve.
home.contactIntro: Best way to reach me is phone or email. Open to GitHub collaborations. Available for software and AI consulting.

descriptions.the-shelf: A personal attention-management & life balancing companion for tracking and celebrating progress.
descriptions.kestrel: An embedded-style system health monitor for macOS with a C++ core engine, Swift menu bar UI, and built-in fault injection for validation.
descriptions.chiribudget: A budgeting app to track finances and visualize spending categories.
descriptions.abstractly: A research radar for tracking AI trends and translating emerging techniques into practical applications.
descriptions.just-be-funny: Improv game and creator hub for comedy themes.
descriptions.brita: AI-powered documentation generator for contextual README files.
descriptions.amk-portfolio: A personal portfolio site to showcase projects and build a refined space beyond a traditional resume.
descriptions.project-bridge: A local-first developer tool that analyzes your GitHub repos against job descriptions and recommends projects to close skill gaps. Privacy-first — everything runs on your machine.
descriptions.for-those-here: A mobile app for end-of-life planning so loved ones don't have to guess on the days they deserve to grieve.
